title: Helsinki for free
content:
I made this super thin and super dark weight of my [Helsinki typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221137/http:/www.ludwigtype.de/fonts/helsinki/overview) and its for free!

Get the fonts here: [helsinkiforfree.ludwigtype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414221137/http:/helsinkiforfree.ludwigtype.de/)

Hope you like it!  
Ludwig

author: ludwiguebele

comments.content: Beautiful, but my country; Cyprus is not available in the list.
Great contrast! Well done, thanks to share.
